| Quotation               = Each one of us will hold to a--A codename. A sign of the zodiac. We will each represent a part of the world. And, by definition of partnership, we will be untouchable. We will be the '''<big>[[Zodiac|ZODIAC]]</big>'''. And like the creatures of mythology that we will represent... People all over the world will stand in awe of us.
| Speaker                 = [[John King (Earth-616)|Cancer]]
| QuoteSource             = Avengers Assemble Vol 2 1

| HistoryText             = After returning from death, [[Thanos (Earth-616)|Thanos]] decided to give twelve different people, who had ambitions to rule the world, special suits which gave super-powers and making [[John King (Earth-616)|John King]], as Cancer, their leader. Their mission was to steal numerous powerful items, which Thanos wanted to take out from Earth in order to supposedly bring balance to our planet and the entire cosmos.{{r|Avengers Assemble Vol 2 1}}

When the [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]] prevented Zodiac from stealing an [[Ultimate Nullifier (Weapon)|Ultimate Nullifier]],  [[Gemini (Thanos' Zodiac) (Earth-616)|Gemini]], [[Virgo (Thanos' Zodiac) (Earth-616)|Virgo]], [[Libra (Thanos' Zodiac) (Earth-616)|Libra]], [[Pisces (Thanos' Zodiac) (Earth-616)|Pisces]] and [[Leo (Thanos' Zodiac) (Earth-616)|Leo]] them to the [[S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarrier]] in order to retrieve the weapon.{{r|Avengers Assemble Vol 2 2}} After Leo died of a heart attack during his fight with the [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Hulk]], the energies of from his suit passed by [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Iron Man]]'s armor, giving him a chance to analyse them. Using a sonic disruptor from the data he received, Iron Man was able to shut down their special costumes and leave them powerless, Thanos appeared with the objective to kill the Avengers for interfering in his plan.{{r|Avengers Assemble Vol 2 3}} When [[Maria Hill (Earth-616)|Maria Hill]] activated the Helicarrier's self-destruct in an attempt to kill Thanos, the Zodiac's master left them to die in the explosion. Cancer was later apprehended and interrogated by the Avengers in order to find out Thanos' plan.{{r|Avengers Assemble Vol 2 4}} The fate of the other five surviving members is unknown.

| Equipment               = Zodiac team members' special battlesuits

| Notes                   = * According to [[Steve Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]], when mentioning the identities of the Zodiac members, one of them was an old bodyguard of the [[Wilson Fisk (Earth-616)|Kingpin]], another previously worked for the [[Mandarin (Earth-616)|Mandarin]], and another was a [[Hydra (Earth-616)|Hydra]] agent. It was never stated which of these members was associated with these identities.{{r|Avengers Assemble Vol 2 4}}
